sentences.sContent: He was reprimanded by a teacher for talking in the corridor.
sentences.sCn: 他因在走廊里说话而被一位老师训斥。

sentences.sContent: He has been fined five thousand dollars and given a severe reprimand.
sentences.sCn: 他被罚款5000美元，并且受到严厉的训斥。

remMethod.val: re(重新) + prim(首要) + (m)and(命令) → 再次给以严厉的命令 → 谴责

trans.tranOther: to tell someone officially that something they have done is very wrong
